author: djd
msg: DERBY-1155 Introduced new class EmbedXARessource. This class implements XAResources. I have moved all XAResource methods to this class.
This class now uses EmbedXAResource (earlier it was using EmbedXAConnection because it also had implementation of XAResource)
Patch contributed by Anurag Shekhar - anurag.shekhar@sun.com

author: jeremias
msg: Examples pointed to the tag not to the trunk. Otherwise, this can be real confusing now that the API has changed.

author: cutting
msg: Fix for HADOOP-19.  A namenode must now be formatted before it may be used.  Attempts to start a namenode in an unformatted directory will fail, rather than automatically creating a new, empty filesystem, causing existing datanodes to delete all blocks.  Thus a mis-configured dfs.data.dir should no longer cause data loss.
